Title: Hezbollah fires at Tel Aviv as Israel bombards Lebanon
Summary: Israel and Hezbollah are trading waves of strikes as their conflict escalates, forcing thousands in Lebanon to flee their homes. Follow the latest news here.

Title: CNN Poll: Harris leads Trump among young voters but falls short of Biden’s 2020 winning margin
Summary: Vice President Kamala Harris holds a 12-point lead over former President Donald Trump among voters younger than 35 – a group that’s largely dissatisfied with the influence it holds in American politics, but remains optimistic about the country’s future, according to new CNN polling conducted by SSRS.

Title: 1 in 3 children worldwide is now nearsighted, study shows
Summary: More than a third of children around the world were nearsighted in 2023, and this proportion will rise to almost 40% in 2050, according to new research.

Title: Russia planning attacks on Ukrainian nuclear power plants, Zelensky warns
Summary: Russia is planning attacks on Ukrainian nuclear power plants, “aiming to disconnect” them from the energy grid, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky told the United Nations General Assembly Wednesday.
